TopicTitle: Make a wish... and have it horribly corrupted!

Articles.Content:
Granted, moderators delete your post. Also, they ban you from the forums.

 

I wich for this wich not to get corrupted.

Edited July 11, 2017 by Physics Student

Granted. Try to corrupt this witch.

Spoiler

I wish there were a fission star. made of 238u.

Granted.

Oh, wait, it's now a very rapidly expanding cloud of fission fragments. Well, it was beautiful while it lasted.

I wish for a Nicholl-Dyson beam to which I have full targeting and fire control.

Granted, but it tells a bad joke every time you manipulate it.

I wish my piano was also a MIDI device.

Wish granted, Luke. Now you have a jedi midichlopiano.

I wish for a dish, and I'm going to make this granted.

granted, but you forgot to grant your own wish

I wish for a hype-train

Granted, but you are run over by it.

 

I wish that the "don't click this" thread was unlocked...

Granted, but you're on vacation in Hawaii while the thread is active, and you don't have internet with you. As soon as you return, the thread is locked again.

I wish fidget spinners were more popular.

Too bad they already are, in wishing this wish you undo the fabric of space-time and cause a black hole to swallow up the universe. NICE GOING! GOSH THERE'S ALWAYS THE ONE IDIOT WHO DOES THIS! REVERT BACK TO LAST QUICK SAVE

I wish I could like my own comments infinity times

 

Edited July 11, 2017 by LazySoUseHyperedit

granted, we all drown in a sea of relish

I wish fidget spinners were less popular

granted replace them per something else, popularity is often time stamped after all

i wish i have no idea with what you can eventually attempt to replace them with ^^

Edited July 11, 2017 by WinkAllKerb''

Granted, they are replaced with physical copies of KSP, but the boxes are too big.

I wish for more parts.

Granted. You now have third arm.

I wish you had corresponding coats.

Granted, but I delete my 3rd arm because it's not what i asked for.

I wish for a Kerbal to come.

Edited July 12, 2017 by thekspbegginer
Replacing "cut off" with "delete"

Granted, a kerbal crashes his rocket into your hosue.

I wish for more time.

Granted, but the Kraken kills you before you get it.

I wish to meet the Red Iron Crown.

Granted, you meet a red iron crown. You conversation is a bit one-sided as it's a lifeless object.

 

I wich I would work at Space X.

Granted, but a rocket lands on you.

I wish for the Don't Click This thread to be open again.

Granted,,,
And ungranted back a minute later, as usual.

I wish I had enabled the fumigator last evening..

Granted, but you don't know what a fumigator is.

I wish for likes.

Granted, kerbiloid gets a like.

I wich the weekend was longer.

Granted, but weekends no longer exist.

I wish for this post to get likes

Granted, but they are taken away.

I wish for a lack of need for sleep.

Granted. You get really bored at nighttime.

I wish my girlfriend and I weren't so far apart.

Granted, you're wherever she is, thereby you're not able to do the things anymore that are the reason you didn't move where she is. Those things must have been really important as they kept you from moving there in the first place and now you're neglecting them, ha!

Wait! That doesn't sound very corrupted ... You also get hit by a car!

 

I wich I would always be happy.

Edited July 15, 2017 by Physics Student
